attributes.action: Oppose Boris Johnson’s vanity project of a new ‘Royal’ yacht.
attributes.additional_details: I want Parliament to oppose Boris Johnson’s vanity project of a new ‘Royal’ yacht and to spend tax payers money more responsibly, especially when noting the U.K. has over 2000 foodbanks.
attributes.background: I want Parliament to oppose Boris Johnson’s vanity project of a new ‘Royal’ yacht and to spend tax payers money more responsibly, especially when noting the U.K. has over 2000 foodbanks.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584822
